about_the_game:
The original Soundtrack to Past Cure. Get your vibes with 8 stunning Tracks, in 192kbps MP3 format.
Around 40 minutes of music.

Tracklist:

1. Past Cure (4:07)
2. My personal battlefield (6:06)
3. Sleepless nights (2:47)
4. Past Secrets (4:35)
5. The way up (2:21)
6. Fletchers dark secret (3:19)
7. The great escape (9:53)
8. End game (6:33)
